attributes.title: I’VE BEEN HAUNTED
attributes.review: I had an awful experience with this app. I wanted to download it because I thought there would be a bunch of racism, misogyny, and discrimination. Just regular things that trump and his supporters believe in. I even heard there was a whole section telling us about how COVID-19 is fake (because every true trump supporter knows it is). But when I opened the app, it glitches out on me. And for some reason the lights in my house flickered and shut off. I thought nothing of it and put in my phone number. But the second I got to the home page, a scream came from my phone! My phone then floated out of my hands and some sort of spirit flew out! I quickly ran out of the room and went to go outside but the ghost locked all the doors! She kept throwing things at me and even tried to grab me! I quickly ran downstairs to my basement and locked the door. But she just walked through the walls! I should’ve known! She tried to bring me to hell and tortured me by saying things like “COVID is real”, “black lives matter”, and “trans people are valid people”. So I was obviously terrified by the lies she was spitting. She then possessed me and forced me to burn all of my trump apparel and donated all of my money to helping immigrants. I was disgusted. She then took my soul and left. So I am currently soulless and to be honest is ok I guess. But I would like this app to pay for my new soul. It must be in mint condition. I’m reaching out privately with my address so you can ship it over. I recommend you not to buy this app as I have no money, no trump apparel, no soul, and I am now realizing the fire from the trump apparel is now burning down my house.

attributes.title: Trump is disgusting ❤️
attributes.review: He is a rapist, racist, pedopile, homophone, transphobe, misogynist, the list goes on.  I’m hoping the Simpson’s was right again ❤️ trump 2020 rotting in jail ✨💕🧚
